limitedTime.name: Blueprint
limitedTime.description: Design a hardware project, up to $400 to build it!

limitedTime.name: Shiba Arcade
limitedTime.description: Make a game with Godot, earn SSS, and get invited to build an arcade in Tokyo (flight stipends available!)
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Shiba is a two-part adventure about game development. Create a game with Godot (an open-source game engine), earn SSS, use that for shop items, but most importantly, an invitation (and flight stipends) to Tokyo, Japan with 29 other Hack Clubbers to build a pop-up arcade!

limitedTime.name: Siege
limitedTime.description: Code every week, get prizes. Make it to the end, get a framework!

limitedTime.name: Reactive
limitedTime.description: Ship a website built with React, get $15 to buy a domain.
limitedTime.requirements: Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS, A little knowledge of JavaScript.

limitedTime.name: Fanpage
limitedTime.description: Ship a project that celebrates a fandom, and we ship you something related to it!

limitedTime.name: Hackberry
limitedTime.description: Built a machine learning project in python, get a personalized raspberry pi kit!

limitedTime.name: Waveform
limitedTime.description: Make your own waveform visualizer, get a grant to buy music

limitedTime.name: birthday-cards
limitedTime.description: You ship a birthday themed project we ship a birthday card!

limitedTime.name: Miniverge
limitedTime.description: Spend 2 hours on a bot, get stickers and a chance for a Bl√•haj or Minecraft!

limitedTime.name: Penumbra
limitedTime.description: Make shaders, and we'll ship you GPUs and posters!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Penumbra is a YSWS, where you create shaders on ShaderToy, and get posters of your shaders shipped right to your doorstep! If you spend up to 45 hours across multiple ships, you'll be able to get a GPU like an RTX 3050!

limitedTime.name: Playphone
limitedTime.description: Work together to built a godot game, get a custom hackclub badge
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Playphonee is an event where people take turns working on one godot game, and try to build an amazing game together. Everyone who participates will get a cool hackclub badge

limitedTime.name: Clutter
limitedTime.description: You ship something to organize your digital life. We ship you a grant to buy something to organize your physical life.

limitedTime.name: Fusering
limitedTime.description: Design a keyring, get your keyring and a carabiner to hang it from!

limitedTime.name: iFrame
limitedTime.description: Draw or edit images using any programming language and we will hang your custom image on HQ wall and send a copy to you

limitedTime.name: BakeBuild
limitedTime.description: Design a cookie cutter, get it shipped!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: You ship : A CAD model of a cookie cutter, we ship : A 3D printed model of your custom cookie cutter & cookies!

limitedTime.name: HackCraft
limitedTime.description: Create a Minecraft mod, get Stickers, Minecraft or a server and terraria!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Join HackCraft to build and ship your own Minecraft mod. Access exclusive resources and a supportive community.
steps: Submit your mod to Hack Club.
details: Participants will receive a Minecraft Java Edition account or server upon successful submission.
Support is available through our Slack community.

limitedTime.name: Summer of Making
limitedTime.description: Build stuff. Get stuff. Repeat.

limitedTime.name: Hivemind
limitedTime.description: Create a roguelike in 7 days, get itch.io credit.
steps: Create a traditional roguelike in 7 days.
Get $2.50 in itch.io credit for each approved hour you spend.

limitedTime.name: Gemini
limitedTime.description: Ship An Android App and get a FREE Android Phone + Dev License!

limitedTime.name: Endpointer
limitedTime.description: Build a REST API, get a grant for Raspberry Pi or Cloud Credits

limitedTime.name: Portal-VR
limitedTime.description: Build an AR/VR application, get a VR headset!

limitedTime.name: Timeless
limitedTime.description: You have 10 days. Make a video game that could last someone 10 years.

limitedTime.name: Toybox
limitedTime.description: You ship a daily game, we ship stickers + keycap keychain + steam gift card. Make the next Wordle.

limitedTime.name: Dummies
limitedTime.description: learn a new language, recieve a guide book!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Join Dummies to take on projects in new languages and earn grant cards for books!
requirements: resulting project can be seen from a weblink

limitedTime.name: Twist
limitedTime.description: Make an esolang, get stickers and a $40 electronics grant.

limitedTime.name: Terminal Craft v5
limitedTime.description: Build and publish your own terminal program to earn $5/hr

limitedTime.name: Infinity
limitedTime.description: Build a website with an infinite realtime canvas, get awesome prizes!

limitedTime.name: Tile
limitedTime.description: Build a tile, get a tile, tile the tiles!

limitedTime.name: Minigame
limitedTime.description: A YSWS where you build "mini" 5 hour games and earn a $20 grant for each one! At the end everyone's games will be combined together to make a big Minigame collection!

limitedTime.name: Squeak
limitedTime.description: Design a mouse case and receive the case and parts!

limitedTime.name: Pathfinder
limitedTime.description: Make a custom PCB controller board and efidget

limitedTime.name: Hackfinger
limitedTime.description: You design a custom appendage (finger, tail, leg, anything you want!) and get your design printed along with a custom control board.

limitedTime.name: Jumpstart
limitedTime.description: Game-dev YSWS running July 9th to Aug 9th ‚ú®

limitedTime.name: Reinforced
limitedTime.description: Build a game, build a bot to beat it, get compute to do more AI stuff.

limitedTime.name: Decode
limitedTime.description: Learn how a tech product works (hardware + software) and we ship you a grant to make it yourself

limitedTime.name: Storyboard
limitedTime.description: Make a visual novel, get $$ for merch/plushie

limitedTime.name: Pulse
limitedTime.description: Build a project using the Spotify API with 6 hours on Hackatime, get 3 months of Spotify Premium

limitedTime.name: Journey

limitedTime.name: Railway

limitedTime.name: Cinema
limitedTime.description: You ship a short story JavaScript animation using canvas. In return, we ship HQ-made caramel popcorn

limitedTime.name: Spatula
limitedTime.description: You ship an app or script that sends push notifications, we'll give you a $5 grant card so you can start sending SMS messages with your code!

limitedTime.description: Make an app that runs on Windows XP, get stickers + super cool headphones from KOSS (the KTX Pro 1 or Porta Pros).

limitedTime.description: ysws where you can't use a scrollbar

limitedTime.name: Swirl
limitedTime.description: Create a quality website with Scoops, get ice cream!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Ship a static website (html + css) that has a Scoop, and get a grant for ice cream to enjoy! Scoops are made up of groups of three html / css features that add something of value to the website.

limitedTime.name: Grub
limitedTime.description: You Ship A responsive website using only HTML and Tailwind CSS. We Ship A grant for junk food.
limitedTime.detailedDescription:
The grant amount is based on the number of unique features implemented:
$6 (Basic Meal): For 2 unique features.
$8 (Refreshment Combo): For 4 unique features.
$10 (Full Combo Meal): For 6 or more unique features.

limitedTime.description: Build an IDE extension, get a keychain or a premium theme for VS Code or Sublime Text!

limitedTime.description: Create a program that uses RTL-SDR, and Hack Club sends you a dongle and antenna kit.

limitedTime.name: Highway
limitedTime.description: Make any hardware project, get up to 350 USD to build it! Keyboard, game console, rocket, robot, 3d printer, etc... Then, go to a 4-day hardware hackathon @ Github HQ this summer!

limitedTime.name: Cafe
limitedTime.description: Collect cups, progress the graph, earn bonuses!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Work on a personal project in a huddle, get a cup every hour. Getting certain amounts of cups can get you special prizes! See the cafe-bulletin channel for more information!

limitedTime.name: RaspAPI
limitedTime.description: Make an API get a Raspberry Pi
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Create an original API using any programming language or framework that you prefer and get a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W to host it on! The API can be anything you want. The possibilities are endless!

limitedTime.name: Black Box
limitedTime.description: Create a constrained, interactive C program and get a portable device to run it on!

limitedTime.name: Hackpad
limitedTime.description: Design a keyboard get the parts! Please note this is only open to those who have build a Macropad previously.

limitedTime.name: Sidequests
limitedTime.description: A short-run low-volume low-effort ysws series from nora & co.
limitedTime.detailedDescription:
#1: SkinAmp (ft. phoebe!) - Ship a WinAmp skin, we'll send you the WinAmp source code on CD-R (started 2025-03-26, ended 2025-04-13).
#2: gemerald - Write something useful in Ruby, i'll send you a sticker (best few get a book!) (started 2025-04-10, ended 2025-04-25).

limitedTime.name: Lockin
limitedTime.description: Work on anything Wakatime-able on call with another Hack Clubber, spin for stickers at the end of the session.

limitedTime.name: BrowserBuddy
limitedTime.description: Build a Chrome extension, and Hack Club provides $30 to launch it on Chrome Web Store.

limitedTime.description: Build a terminal program and earn a Raspberry Pi 4
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Build & publish a cross-platform terminal app. Get 10 users, open-source it, and snag your Pi 4

limitedTime.description: Make a neopixel based PCB, get the parts to make one!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Create a PCB using KiCad / other EDA. It should use neopixels and a Xiao RP2040, and act as a decoration. Once submitted you can get the parts to make one yourself!

limitedTime.description: Create an iOS app and receive a $100 Apple Developer account to publish it.

limitedTime.description: Build a project or feature and get exclusive prizes for each card requirement you hit.

limitedTime.name: Thunder

limitedTime.name: Shipwrecked
limitedTime.description: You Ship 60 hours of work, 4 projects, and go viral. We Ship A ticket to an island hackathon in Boston.
limitedTime.detailedDescription: You ship 60 hours of coding work, four shipped projects, and make one of them go viral. We ship you a ticket to Shipwrecked, a four-day, in-person hackathon on Cathleen Stone Island in the Boston Harbor, with travel stipends available.

limitedTime.name: Neighborhood
limitedTime.description: You Ship 100 hours of coding on one project. We Ship A free summer of coding in San Francisco.
limitedTime.detailedDescription: You ship 100 hours of coding work on a single, new, open-source project. We ship you a flight to San Francisco and cover your housing, food, and transit for up to three months while you code with other teenagers.

recentlyEnded.name: Armed
recentlyEnded.description: Develop an arm assembly program, get lego.

recentlyEnded.name: The Zoo
recentlyEnded.description: Make an animal themed Svelte site, earn Ikea Animal Plushies
recentlyEnded.detailedDescription: The Zoo is a Svelte YSWS where participants build an animal themed Svelte site and earn Mynts (currency) which can be turned into an HCB grant at the end to buy Ikea plushies. Get one giant Djungleskog, or multiple mini Blahaj, it's all up to you. Here's the best part: the better your submission is, the more Mynts you earn!

recentlyEnded.name: Authly
recentlyEnded.description: Build the weirdest and never-before-seen authentication system, get yubikeys, programmable nfc tags, antivirus giftcards and more!

recentlyEnded.name: Silicon

drafts.detailedDescription: Build a project with daily dev vlogs, we ship you points for every dev vlog you create, which you can use to purchase exciting goodies after shipping your project

drafts.description: Build a robot using Arduino and receive one.

drafts.name: Fishin Chips
drafts.description: Build TTL logic circuits without microcontrollers, get components to make them real!
drafts.detailedDescription: This is a TTL (transistor-transistor logic) YSWS, which means no microcontrollers will be given! Build fundamental digital electronics like adders, clocks, or even a 4-bit computer. Dream big, but focus on the electronic fundamentals.

drafts.name: PicoJam
drafts.description: Create a PICO-8 game, get a PICO-8 license for free!
drafts.detailedDescription: Use PICO-8 Education Edition to build a game with your own assets (art, sound effects, etc). Your game should have a basic goal and at least 2 minutes of gameplay. The top winner will receive a Physical PICO-8 Emulator Device!

drafts.name: Hack the Line
drafts.description: Get an Asterisk server running, and we'll send you a VoIP phone.

drafts.name: Constellation
drafts.description: You ship a self host, full stack website, we ship a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W to host it on

drafts.name: Jetsu
drafts.description: You ship a ML Robot, We ship a Jetson Nano / Jetson Orin Nano
drafts.detailedDescription:
Event Dates: 1st June to 31st July
Participants will receive the necessary funding to build their robots.
Before funding, participants must:
  - Submit a Bill of Materials (BOM) listing the expected components.
  - Submit their initial machine learning project on GitHub with a well-documented README.
Machine learning models will be developed on laptops to control the robots.
Coding activity will be tracked using WakaTime.
Participants must log their work hours in a detailed project journal.
Rewards & Incentives:
  - All participants who successfully complete the project will receive a Jetson Nano Developer Kit (4GB).
  - Those who invest 100+ hours will be rewarded with a NVIDIA Jetson Orin (8GB).
